* Updated Post to be much longer *

BOXC Websites is aiming to provide the cheapest web services while still giving you every single amazing feature that you would want! We provide VPSes on our amazing dedicated servers located in Pennsylvania USA and (New!) Kansas US!

Our servers have 72GB of Ram and we do not oversell! Coming in with 24 cores and 5X 1TB Raid 5 HDD to make sure you have the fastest and biggest VPSes that we can provide. When you order a VPS you get the special SolusVM panel as you would get from almost all other places and 24-hour ticket and email support. Don't forget live chat too for on the spot fixes to your problem!

Our support is also the best! We offer you the best customer service to make sure you problems are solved fast and that any questions you have will not exist anymore!

Cheapest VPS Plan!

> 1024MB Ram

> 1 Core

> 80GB Disk Space

> 100MBPS Network

> Unlimited Bandwidth

> SolusVM Control Panel

> KVM

> $5.99 / Monthly

Order today @ http://boxcwebsites.com !
